entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
